Titles.myPage-description: This page shows how a custom route will be handled.

HomePage.item-2: Save and see your changes instantly.

MyForm.item-1-description: This is your public display name.

LoginForm.username-min: Must be {min} or more characters long
LoginForm.username-max: Must be {max} or fewer characters long
LoginForm.password-min: Must be {min} or more characters long
LoginForm.password-max: Must be {max} or fewer characters long

Logo.full: A simple logo featuring a white triangle centered on a black background, commonly associated with Vercel, a platform for deploying Next.js apps.

PWA-screenshots.home: A default Next.js page with a black background, white text, and the Next.js logo. It suggests editing src/app/page.tsx to get started, with buttons for "Deploy now" and "Read our docs" below.
PWA-screenshots.myPage: A minimalist web page with a black background and white text saying "This is my page" and a link to "Go Back to Main Page."
